name: Bob (the game)
description:
What is this game:

Bob is a 2D pixel-art style puzzle-game I made for The Secret Santa Jam, this is the first game I've finished and although was not as good as expected; I am still happy with the outcome!

Meet Bob:

Story:

Bob is lost and needs to get home; clear the path to his house so he can do so.

Features:

  • Timed Levels; with Highscores to beat.
  • 5 levels
  • Different mechanics to learn

Conclusion:

I learnt a lot from this game; and although I am not too happy with the results, I am still thankful I completed it! This is the first game I've completed, the first Unity 2D game I made and I learnt a lot code wise during it!
